title: Allstate and Hancock Seek Careful Drivers With Healthy Diets
sub_head: Partnership between insurers will reward safe drivers with potentially cheaper life insurance
body:
If you let Allstate Corp. track your driving, you can get a discount on car insurance. If you let John Hancock monitor your diet and exercise, you can get a discount on life insurance. Now, the two insurers are teaming up on the theory that safe drivers live longer.
The price will be letting the insurers monitor a lot of what you do.
